body.p:
R. K. Williams, President,
J. N. Beadles, Cashier.

BRANCH BANK OF ASHLAND,
Mayfield, Ky., Oct 3d 1861.
Hon B. Magoffin
Governor of Ky,

Dr Sir: I have written to Hon. T F Marshall requesting him to call on you & get you to recommend W. G. Blount of this county as a notary public for this (Graves County) If the Legislature has adjourned you will please have the kindness to reappoint Mr Blount. He is the only notary now in this county authorized to act & his time has about expired & I have no one to protest the notes &c of our office if he is not continued.
I will enclose the Secretaries fee on receipt of the commission

Graves Co.
Notary
W. G. Blount
Comd. Oct. 23d 1861
